actions.name: Poison Tip
actions.description: Poison your opponent for 2 turns. Costs 25 energy

actions.name: ROS Grenade
actions.description: Damage all enemies with a burst of ROS for 2 turns. Costs 15 energy and 5 health.

actions.name: Acidity
actions.description: Coat the environment in acid for 2 turns dealing aditional damage. Costs 25 energy, 30 health.

actions.name: Shoot
actions.description: Blast a single combatent for 15 damage.

actions.name: Antibody Rounds
actions.description: Stick all enemies antibodies for 3 turns. Antibodies make subsequent attacks do more damage. Costs 25 energy.

actions.name: Antibody Snipe
actions.description: Stick one enemy with antibodies for 5 turns. Antibodies make subsequent attacks do more damage. Costs 15 energy.

actions.name: Shoot
actions.description: Blast a single combatent for 25 damage.

actions.name: Air Strike
actions.description: Bombard a party of pathogens with ROS for 3 turns. Costs 25 energy and 25 health.

actions.name: Target Locked
actions.description: Use antibodies to cleanly target an enemy combatant. Inflicts antibodies, costs 20 energy.
